title: FS: T206 Tolstoi of HOFer Vic Willis, Throwing Pose, SGC 55 - SOLD
author: ValKehl

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Tolstoi of HOFer Vic Willis, Throwing Pose, SGC 55 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
T206 card with the tougher TOLSTOI back of VIC WILLIS (HOF) of the St. Louis Cardinals in a throwing pose.  Graded SGC 55 (VG/EX+ 4.5).  This nicely centered card has a light wet sheet transfer (I think this is what this is called) on the front.  The PSA & SGC pop reports each show 7 of these cards - only 3 graded higher in the combined reports.  Price is $299 delivered for payment via check or money order ($308 via PayPal).  I prefer email to PM.  CARD IS SOLD!
Val Kehl
[url]ekehl333@aol.com[/url]
